Summary: Hotel is a clean, well kept, unpretentious basic accommodation that served me well during a recent 4 night stay. There are only 15 rooms on the two-story property, all facing a busy street. I was assigned room 303, on the ground floor in the middle of 6 rooms. It was nicely painted with neutral colors and one accent wall. It had a rather large mini-refrigerator (with freezer compartment), microwave, in-room safe, iron and ironing board, Keurig coffeemaker (with 2 K-cups, 2 liquid creamers, and cardboard cups), and a quite small LCD wall mounted TV (Cox Cable 500 channels, good variety). Both queen beds were very firm (comfortable, new!) and 3 decent pillows per bed. The bathroom had hair dryer, tub/shower combo, 4 bath towels, 2 face towels, 2 hand towels plus mini sized bar
Room tip: 2nd floor rooms don't hear overhead foot traffic BUT get more noise from freeway

Summary: I checked in August 26th 2018 and checked out August 28th. Comfortable bed and nice big bathroom but I did have a handicapped room. I am not handicapped but it was the only room left and it was more than sufficient. The toiletries provided were exceptional and the water pressure in the shower was more than sufficient. The lady who checked me and was very nice. I had no issues and would be more than happy to stay again.

Priced well, clean, and friendly staff, but way too noisy. It’s right on the main strip, so you can hear cars going by all night long. If you turn the a/c up it blocks out the noise somewhat. My real problem was with the other guests. We stayed on the bottom floor. We could hear people stomping above us, and others next door slamming doors shut. It’s descent for the price though. Just make sure you request an upstairs room possibly in the corner.

We stayed at this hotel on Memorial Day weekend so my husband and I could visit our son who is stationed at Camp Pendleton. Great location to the base and very charming town. Price was the best! Fridge and microwave were first rate. Rooms were clean and comfortable. No ice machine, but convenience store is in close proximity. The reason I titled this hospitality is because my son left his vehicle parked here all weekend as well as our car. I was concerned we would be reprimanded or worse, towed because parking is at a premium all over southern California. I was thankful they let us keep it parked. Now that we travel with older children, it is not unusual for us to have more than one vehicle. Thank you Hotel Miramar.

The woman who checked us in seemed super sweet. Clean room, clean sheets, no weird smells. The noise from the traffic off the street seemed a little loud at first but after a day of traveling I didn’t have any trouble falling asleep. Helped myself to one of the yogurts they provided for breakfast. The grandma who checked us out was so nice.

The area at night looked sketchy but I was tired. Leery of parking in the back lot but not alot of options yet I was the only car. Oh well. Room seemed chilly and there was no means of heat but there was an ac unit. Door needs more weather stripping since daylight is clearly seen which added to the chilliness. Only 1 trash can in the vanity area but none in the bathroom or anywhere else. Bathroom could use a curtain or mini blinds over the small window so if there are any weirdos watching from back building, they can't see you change for the shower... However, I did find it clean and beds were comfy. Clean linens and toiletries provided, hair dryer, microwave, fridge, ironing board and safe. It's right on a busy road but is still pretty quiet. Definitely nothing fancy but

Pleasantly surprised by the purity of the rooms, especially the carpet, because usually in hotels with carpets without shoes can not walk. Unfortunately, the television did not work, or I just could not figure out how to turn it on, and the screen did not go out all the time, although everything was off. A little disturbed by the noise of passing cars, it would probably be better if the windows came out on the opposite side. However, overall cleanliness and accuracy were pleasing.

This place is exactly as described and shown in the pictures. The bed is comfy, the free WiFi is strong and easy to sign into -  the tv, fridge, microwave and heater/AC were all working great. Plus, the hotel is right off the main road so it was easy to find.

Being the area very expensive, you will appreciate the Hotel Miramar for its simple but comfortable features. It’s clean and All you need is there: Coffee machine, full TV, iron with its board, safe, AC, microwave, fridge, complimentary mineral water... Don’t miss the opportunity! P.S.: looking for a good meal? HH Cotton’s in Avenida Del Mar, not far form the hotel.

Wtf was that, is not a reaction any hotel should be proud of from it's guests. We all expect Cheap Hotels to be less fancy, have less Equipment, Amenities, etc.  however the one area in which a Cheap Hotel can compete is in Customer Service. And I beg to differ with the other reviewers..... The family who runs the place were pleasant upon check in....but the morning was a very different story.  Check out is at 11.  We made the mistake of requesting a late checkout @ 10am, not wanting to wait till 11 so we had a chance talk about how much the extra charge would be and when we intend to leave, etc. That's when the attitude shifted Dr. JEKEL became Mr. HYDE. We requested a 3pm checkout time. We were informed that it would be $11 per hour but we had to goto the office and pay right

i was very appreciative of how attentive the owners were . with 2 small children and luggage they were kind enough to move me to a down stairs room, and also help me work the tv remote and put on disney jr for my kiddos!!!! we only stayed one night but we had a chance to take a 2 minute drive to san clemente pier/beach. and also take a 2 minute walk to a great restaurant down the st . called happa j's i think it was . i was pleased ! my kids were happy the room was clean and spacious ! and hotel management was great !!! will stay again !!!( only next time a bit longer to enjoy the beach!!) thank you!!!

Summary Heading: A Good Value In A High Priced Area
Summary: I stayed at this hotel for one night on July 27th. Is on El Camino Real a brief walk to the beach and a short drive to downtown San Clemente and nearby Dana Point and Laguna Beach. It is a small older property with limited parking. The exterior isn't inviting. Don't let that fool you. My room, 309 was on the second level of a 2 story structure. All rooms are entered from the outside.  I was pleasantly surprised and impressed as soon as I opened the door. A very modern and Spotless interior. My room had a King Size bed, a large desk and work area with plenty of light switches and convenient electrical outlets. The standard coffee pot, ironing board and iron were in the room. So was a clem and functional refrigerator and microwave.  Best of all, my room had an air conditioner with

With hotel stays costing more and more, it's nice to find one that is reasonably priced and delivers on it's promises.  Hotel Miramar was clean and equipped with newer "stuff" as advertised following the trend to take an old property and remodel it to be more comfortable.  Management was efficient and friendly.  Bed was comfortable.  Countertop and shower surround are solid-surface.  TV has HBO and all the channels.  Microwave, Keurig coffee, refrigerator, air-conditioner, iron, etc. all provided and worked as they should.  Continental breakfast was as minimal as could be, but better than nothing. Downside?  Noise.  Being sandwiched between Highway 5 and a four-lane road, it's hard not to hear car and truck noise all day and all night.  So, bring your ear plugs and enjoy all the

This hotel is conveniently located on a bus line that runs along the coast to Long Beach for a pittance.  It also is an easy walk to the State Park beach and a bit farther to the pier.  There was traffic noise during the day, but it becomes quieter at night.  Overall, we enjoyed our stay very much.

This motel was pretty nice. The gentleman at the front desk was personable and very accomodating as I had forgot to ask for a first-floor room and he went out of his way to call another guest and request an exchange for us to have one. The room was comfy, as was the bed. This place does NOT have an ice-maker, so we had to go across the street to 7-11 for a bag. For only this reason, we would not stay here again (gotta have easy-access ice,) but all-in-all, our stay was pleasant.

The rooms were big and super clean.  There is not really a breakfast provided and it was difficult to use the Internet.  The location was quiet, not near the freeway.  We had a very enjoyable five night stay.
Manager Response: Every day we count our blessings that our business attracts such nice and kind hearted patrons like you. It was a pleasure serving you.

Summary: The hotel is located in an area in close proximity to shops and the beach. Everything in the hotel was immaculate (from the lobby to the rooms). The outside landscape is well kept. The check-in personnel was very friendly. The check-in process was quick and efficient.

Well stocked room, comfy bed, great shower pressure, enjoyed the HBO (being a movie freak). Enjoyed the coffee and bagel in the morning.  The street noise was a bummer but the AC noise drowned it out.  Try Pedro's Fish Tacos across the street. Yummy!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your recent visit and subsequent wonderful praise. Feedback, especially from such well-spoken customers like you, is not only invaluable to those researching businesses like ours, but is also important to us. We greatly appreciate you taking the time to share your comments and feedback with us. Thanks again.

Summary: the place is perfect clean as any clean i have ever seen even has direct tv with all the channels  the shops and cafes were hawaiann themed if you love san clemente this the best right by freeway and close to all the neat little fun  but out enough to be its own comfy little getaway  i look forward to coming back soon and staying a few days
Manager Response: We deeply appreciate your very positive review of our business. We are very pleased that you got to enjoy many favorite aspects of what we have to offer. It is always most rewarding to hear directly from our customers and especially those willing to provide their positive perspective with the online world and beyond. Please revisit us soon and often.

Summary: It's a nice place in San Clemente: I've never been in this town before and can assure you it's a great place: the Ocean view is awsome and the beach is charming. The room was big, clean and tidy: no comforts was missing.
Manager Response: Thank you for both your patronage and for posting such generous comments regarding our business. We work very hard to ensure that we please wonderful customers like you. Thank you for validating that we are accomplishing that goal.

Summary: It's a nice little place to spend the night and not far from the beach, 3-5 minute drive. I had a good time and experience staying there. The customer service was cool, the room keeper was friendly and there's a 7-11 right across the street just in case you might need any edibles or beverages.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words about Hotel Miramar. It is always a great pleasure to hear that we are serving our customers well. We look forward to serving you again soon.

Summary: We came from a far away place, and found this hotel very confortable for a stopover before Los Angeles. The room was better that I expected, as it had great space, a desk, WiFi, it was well ventilated and we fitted perfectly (2 children and 2 adults). Closeby there are nice restaurants to have dinner, and breakfast, where some of them will bring them to the hotel. The aircon made some noise, but other than that, the quality for the price we paid was great.
Manager Response: You covered virtually every aspect of what we think a customer should be evaluating when choosing a business such as ours. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you again soon. Thanks again.

Summary: Where do I start? It was a through and through horrible experience.  From the rude first impression with the owners at check-in, to the overcharge  way beyond my total charge at booking online, to the mandatory "pay your total  up front" charge, to the nightly loud "run engine all night" semis in front of  our room, to the no coffee meak "breakfast". It was all just a horrible experience  that truly tainted our once per year family vacation.  The owners made no effort at all to make us feel comfortable during our 8 night stay. The "lobby" a 6 by 6 feet room with a buzz in door system, also held the "breakfast" if you can even call it  that. Packaged pastries, yogurt, juice boxes, bagels and some cream cheese was all that was offered.  At check in we were informed that Hotel.com

I checked on Sunday afternoon. It is privately owned and the woman was very courteous   The room was nice!  Loved The shower head ! They even had bottled water for their guests!  I will definitely stay there again! Very close to San Clemente pier. 5 minute drive!  The king size bed was very comfortable. Clean and spacious!  Close to the I-5.
Manager Response: Your comments regarding our business is most appreciated. We are thrilled that you feel led to share your comments with fellow consumers. Thank you.

Summary: We went to San Clemente to visit with my daughter and her husband who are stationed at Camp Pendleton.   The hotel is about 8 minutes to the gate closest to San Clemente.  The hotel was very clean.  The room was suited with 2 queen beds that were very comfortable.  It also had a small fridge, microwave, iron, hair dryer, and a Keurig coffee maker.  The owner was very accommodating in making sure we had everything we needed.  When we return we would most definitely stay here again.   Other reviews mentioned road noise, but when your air is on in the room you can't hear much of anything outside.
Manager Response: We appreciate your conveying thoughts with fellow consumers who hopefully might be our future satisfied customers as well. As you probably realize, consumer reviews are the number one determinant for influencing other consumers. Thanks and thanks again for your patronage.

Summary Heading: Family run hotel showing pride of ownership
Summary: My wife and I rented a room for one night.  We were both very favorably impressed with the cleanliness and size of the nicely decorated room, comfort of the king size bed, well functioning wall mounted a/c and 32" flat screen tv (both with wireless remote control) and the Keurig coffee maker. It also has a small refrigerator and microwave.  The front window has a shutter which opens centrally and has adjustable slats for light which is more substantial than the usual curtain. All rooms are said to be similar varying mainly in bed arrangements. Street noise, such as a large truck, was minimally noticeable with the a/c running. This small hotel (actually laid out like most 2 story motels) is located across the street from a 7-11 convenience store and within walking distance of a
Manager Response: Thank you for taking some of your valuable time to provide fellow consumers with your rich perspective. We appreciate the feedback and look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary Heading: Standard hotel very close to the centre
Summary: I stayed at this hotel for 2 nights. Its around a 10 minute walk to the centre of san clemente and around 15-20 minutes to the main beach.   The room was clean fresh and a much higher standards than a chain.  Breakfast was good and had some choice with it also. There isn't a seating area because breakfast is served in the reception area. But we took it back to our room.   The owners are very friendly and will do anything to make your stay enjoyable.   When I return to the area I will stay at this hotel rather than a chain hotel in the area.
Manager Response: It was a pleasure to have you as one of our guests and hope to have the same opportunity often in the future. We appreciate your kind words about our staff and how you enjoyed your visit.

Summary: Great Place, great staff, nice clean room. Highly recommend this hotel, close to the beach, many restaurants, and shopping. We will definitely stay here again. Great to see the whole family working together.

We stayed at the motel Miramar in San Clemete because it was close to our son at Camp Pendleton.  It was very clean and staff was very friendly!  Close to restaurants and the beach.  We will use Motel Miramar again!!!  Thanks!!!

The service is excellent, always there to help us, very kind helpful. The room is very clean and the bed is very big and confortable. The breakfast is good and it begins earlier and goes till late. It is in a relaxing area, next to the beach and 7 eleven and some bars and stores. There are many places to park.

Very good staff, clean room, good location, we loved it! We recomend it for SURE!!! Pretty nice place! San Clemente its a very nice city and if you want to go there in a good hotel you should choose MIramar Hotel

Checked in and there was no running water at the time. Water didn't start working again till hours after we checked in. There is a kuerig machine but no k-cups for it. Checked out at almost 730 in the morning and there was still no breakfast avaliable for guests. They were still "preparing" it. The staff consists of an Indian family whom all live together where the front desk is located. They looked like they were just getting up when we checked out.

We stayed in this hotel for just one night but we were super happy with it! We arrived late from the airport in LA but the staff was very friendly and polite. The room was facing the street but it was quiet at night! The beds are huge, which is lovely.  Just one remark; breakfast is a quick snack in the office that you can take up to your room or eat on the road. Apples, yogurts, sweet pastries, coffee and juice.

I stayed at Hotel Miramar with a friend visiting from overseas. I stayed here a couple times years ago and came back because it is always consistent. The front desk staff is very kind and accommodating, and the rooms are always clean and conveniently located in the center of town. Thanks again for having us!

Took a chance used TripAdvisor when on trip 5hrs into a drive after full work day. Great recommendations so now I also say good choice. Older place but kept up nicely. Clean and comfortable. Shower was note worthy due because I'm 6'2 and didn't have to stoop under the shower head. I'd stay again if in the area and needed a good place to rest.

For a two-star hotel and $85/night, I thought is was great price per value. The room was spacious and mostly clean, with some of the items scratched or uncleaned (for example, fingerprints on the minifridge). The shower had lots of room, including a curtain rack that bowed out which gave more room in the shower. The shower head was really nice with good water pressure and a large shower head with steady stream. There was another setting that allowed for a massager that was nice. The beds were REALLY comfortable (not too soft, not too hard), as were the pillows. The sheets and towels also weren't overwhelmingly smelling like bleach. The concierge at first tried to say the room was $10 more per night than the Internet and the person we called earlier claimed, which was the only

Elderly eastern couple at office, no smiles, no conversation, etc.  Did not feel welcome.  It's not a bad location but a little pricey.  It was Clean and roomy, but had limited parking. Probably won't stay there again.  We try a new place every year till we find a great one.

We are currently on a road trip down the coast this was our 4th stop we booked in through bookings.com staff were helpful and friendly. Room was clean and tidy - ours had a bit of a smell but we just got a car air freshener to hang up and that solved it. The location is right on the highway but this does mean you are close to lots but not walking distance to the beach. You will need a car. There is do it your service laundry up the road and one where they will do it for you directly across the road. The beds were comfortable and all facilities worked well. Breakfast served by the hotel was basic but decent - bagels, breakfast bars, juice . Great for a short stay

Summary Heading: Clean room and friendly staff - great for the night!
Summary: My mother wanted to go whale watching while she visited me in CA.  So, we decided to drive down the night before, instead battling work week traffic the morning of.  We found this little place nearby, and it was absolutely perfect in every way!  Small, quaint, quiet, and close to Dana Point, without being crazy expensive.  It was perfect.  They had breakfast and everything.  Free wifi in the room.  Great space and cute.  I would stay here again anytime!  Thank you, Hotel Miramar!

We travel by motorcycle, the room pricey but clean,  better then paying those $$tupid prices on the coast. Great one nighter .comfortable beds, just five miles south of Dana Point. we were glad and lucky to get the last vacancy for the night.

Rooms at this hotel were very clean. We had a king size bed. The check in was fast and parking was on site.   The morning's free breakfast choices were very limited. Don't count on a satisfying breakfast.

Stay with people who care about your needs, great distance from the beach and across from other services.  Liked the room very much and felt very safe there.  Very quiet and located in a great area with very little noise distracting your sleep.

Room was clean, no musty smells. Coffee maker micro and fridge were nice. Some instatnt hot cereal would be a nice addition to free breakfast. The location was good for us, close to places to eat and shop for food.

Beds were clean old man and women that live and run place very rud there is No Pool No WIFI at all they never left me cooffee until last night breakfast  was she Danish a few pieces of fruit and some activity a yogurt to choose from a joke loud air conditioner do not know why this place is  recommended at all

From the outside, Hotel Miramar doesn't look like much, but the rooms were large, clean, comfortable, and well-appointed. What impressed us the most, though, was the kindness of the people running the place. The let us use their dryer after we were caught in the rain and offered us additional coffee and creamers for the Keurig coffee maker in our room. The next day was hot, and as we were getting on our bikes to leave, they came outside to hand out extra water bottles....how nice was that! One downside is that since it's on a busy street, there is some street noise, (though it didn't bother us) The upside to that is there are plenty of restaurants close by. We'd definitely stay again!

The staff was so nice to our group of 12! We all had expensive bikes from a coastal bike trip in which we got soaked in the rain, even let us use their dryer for a little. Comfortable beds and pillows, clean, neat, reasonably priced.

We were a group of 6 couples biking through San Clemente, and we stayed one night here.  The family who runs the motel are so friendly and helpful.  They even put us all on the ground floor so we wouldn't have to carry our bikes upstairs.  When we were leaving, the owner came out and handed us all bottles of water.  When I couldn't reach my husband in the room, the owner offered to knock on his door and give him a message.  It looks quite basic from the outside, but the rooms are freshly painted and have great beds and pillows, a flat screen TV, coffee maker, toiletries, iron, sofa and coffee table, etc.  It was a great deal!  I would definitely come back.

The hotel has everything i needed! queen bed, fridge, microwaves, wifii, very clean.. inf front a seven and eleven store and near to trestles beach! I recommend to everyone, for sure you will no regret.

Nicely located in a good area of San Clemente close to I5 with a residential area buffering the fwy noise. Same owners for 29 years; their management and pride of ownership shines bright! An easy walk to one of the best beaches in Southern California.  The room was squeaky clean. No odors of any kind including scents to mask them. It had one of the most comfortable beds I've slept on with crisp high-count cotton sheets. There's a fridge, microwave and brand-new Ralphs market a few blocks away. An ironing board, flat-screen TV loaded w/ cable and your very own Keurig coffee maker!  It was a great hotel experience in every way - better than many I've had for twice the price - and I look forward to the next visit.

Even though it is located on a main road, it was very quiet. Very clean and maid service everyday. They were very nice and helpful. The "OC tavern" right down the street was excellent. I was nervous about staying near the beach on a holiday weekend but it wasnt that crowded and lots to do.

Was very impressed with this hotel for the price. The location is on a busy road, however we were not disturbed by traffic. The from was large and very clean. Bedding was good quality. It had a free safe. Toiletries were good and the shower was excellent. Had fridge and microwave. Walked to the beach which took about 20 minutes.

The location is close to shops and restaurants.  The room was pristine.  The mattress was especially comfortable.   The only drawback was the air conditioner was a little loud. Fortunately there was a window to open for the cool breeze.

This hotel was a pleasant surprise. Everyone is worried about staying at a clean hotel. This place was very clean.The bed was super comfortable, fresh linen,  clean shower and toliet. The staff was very accommodating and friendly. This place was great for price very reasonable. The building  is older and off a main Street (could hear the cars at times). But not a big deal. I would stay at this hotel again.

My family and I got stuck in San Clemente when construction + a bad auto accident basically shut down the 5S. There was a surf competition this weekend so it seemed every hotel/motel was full until we happened upon Hotel Miramar. The owners were kind and humble and made sure we had everything we needed for the night's stay. We managed to get some rest in one of their comfortable and clean rooms and were greeting with smiles and bagels in the morning. I would stay here again if we ever stop in San Clemente again. Thanks!

We stayed here on 3/28/2015 based mainly on the reviews we read on TripAdvisor. The rooms were very clean, neat and comfortable and management was courteous. What was a surprise and we have no idea why anyone who stayed here did not mention it,is the street noise. The motel is located on El Camino Real North,near I-5  which is a good location in San Clemente but it is right on a very busy street and all of the rooms face it. We stayed on a Saturday night and the street noise did not abate until around 12:45 am. It started up again around 7:00 am.  I wish we had known for having a quiet and peaceful room is very important to us as well as it being clean and comfortable.

The staff here were very kind and helpful! They gave off a very home-y vibe. The room was well-sized, very clean, and the beds were very comfortable to sleep in. It has a great location! It was close to everything that I wanted to see in California and I was very happy with the service that I got. It's in walking distance of a lot of good food places - sit down restaurants, fast food, and a 7-Eleven. The rooms have everything that you really need and would look for! I would highly recommend this hotel for anyone! It was a neat little gem for a great price!
Manager Response: I want to thank you for staying with us at our hotel in San Clemente. I am pleased to hear that you had an enjoyable stay while you were in San Clemente. Your feedback is extremely valuable to the operations of our hotel and we very much value your feedback.  My staff and I hope that you will consider us again in the future on your visit to San Clemente

Summary Heading: Wonderful Stay over the weekend of 2-20-15
Summary: I have to say, I am absolutely impressed with this fantastic little spot in San Clemente. The ownership are courteous, quick and helpful. They were speedy in getting us checked in. I was extremely and pleasantly surprised by our room. The bed was a King, pillow top with fantastic sheets, comfy pillows. The room was immaculate, well cared for and amenities were great. Keurig Coffee maker, Paul Sebastian products, fresh water bottles, fridge, safe and more. The decor was lovely and really overall quite enchanting.  Being and individual who works in review and reputation management, I have to say, I give this little hotel a 10 out of 10 for GREAT customer service, GREAT stay, GREAT location, GREAT sleep, GREAT experience overall.  A special thank you to the ownership for a
Manager Response: We deeply appreciate your very positive review of our business. We are very pleased that you got to enjoy many favorite aspects of what we have to offer. It is always most rewarding to hear directly from our customers and especially those willing to provide their positive perspective with the online world and beyond. Please revisit us soon and often.

Summary Heading: GREAT location near Camp Pendleton / beach
Summary: This is a small hotel with on site management family that are very polite, helpful.  Walking distance to some very good restaurants and shopping.  Short drive to beach and more sights.  Quiet little town atmosphere, relaxing.  Hotel just completed a major refurbish, so everything looks brand new.  Would recommend to anyone looking for a quiet relaxing retreat.
Manager Response: Thank you for both your patronage and for posting such generous comments regarding our business. We work very hard to ensure that we please wonderful customers like you. Thank you for validating that we are accomplishing that goal.

Summary: Stayed here for three days while visiting family in San Clemente.  Very comfortable king size bed w/pillow top mattress, loveseat with coffee table, and large desk with high back swivel chair.  The room also had a microwave and small fridge.  Easy, but somewhat limited parking, although generally adequate for the number of rooms.  Wi fi signal was good but had to re-sign in a few times with both a provided user name and password.  Limited grab and go breakfast with yogurt, apples, orange juice, and sugary pastries.  All in all I consider this a good find for a clean and comfortable room at a small family run motel at a budget price.

Very clean, spacious rooms with many amenities.  Many hotel rooms of this price range have an obvious odor of cleaning supplies as if to hide/mask noxious smells.  There was none of that here.       Also, of note was the kind and courteous service.       I would highly recommend this hotel.  My family and I would definitely stay here again when we are in the vicinity!

Summary Heading: The nicest stay during my vacation!
Summary: I really got to admit that during the whole trip in the U.S. the staff in this hotel was unmatched! They've helped me in every situation, always with a smile on their faces. The small breakfast, ready every morning, was a very nice touch. The rooms were kept clean every day and the room looked very nice and stylish. The whole hotel has that motel feel to it, although executed in 4* hotel quality. Across the street is a 7-11, which was very convenient during our stay.  Also, while we were checking out on our way to San Francisco, the staff told us about worthwhile stops along the way and thanks to them we had a very tasty lunch later that day. That's the kind of helpful service that nobody managed to top before and after our stay.  So, to sum everything up: I cannot recommend

Summary Heading: Amazing room and friendly front desk staff!
Summary: I loved the hotel! It was spacious and super clean. They had keurigs in the room and the BEST complimentary shampoos and conditioners and lotion. Lemon and citrus sage! Small things like that make the stay better. I definitely recommend Miramar Hotel.

Our family of four stayed for a brief time on our drive from the Bay area to San Diego.  The place is more of a motel than a hotel.  I called the motel at 1 am as we were too tired to continue driving.  The place was reasonably priced for a weeknight stay.  We checked out by 8 am. We booked a room with two beds. Although the front office said they were two queen beds, the beds are full size. The room includes a mini fridge and they offered complementary bottles of water.  I would recommend this place if you want to stay in San Clemente.

From the outside of the place, I wasn't sure what to expect, but my room was great. Comfy (new and not saggy) bed, nice shampoo and conditioner, free wifi, and a refrigerator in the room. Walking distance to a few good restaurants. And I like that there is a 7/11 across the street.

Summary Heading: Pleasantly Surprised it's a Beautiful Place!!
Summary: I recently stayed here for a family vacation to San Clemente. The room was very clean and comfortable. The staff were very friendly. You can tell they love this place by how well it is kept up, the outside is just as clean as the inside. I had my kids with me and was worried about one of them sleeping on the floor but as soon as I walked in the room I was no longer worried, you could just tell it was clean. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone who is looking for a place to stay in San Clemente. It's close to many restaurants and the beach is just a short drive away.

It has great access from the Freeway and it is a cheap option in San Clemente. It's clearly a Motel with the images being clearly better than the reality. They took a copy of our credit card, fortunately no money was charged, but I found it weird. The sheets were not very clean and neither the pillow.

This place is a good option if you want to stay in San Clemente. I stayed here twice so I can really recommend it. You should stay here if you're on a budget and don't care for amenities, it's not meant for a honeymoon ok? It is located right by the 405 so you'll have great access from the freeway but it's rather far from the beach and has no pool or nice views. There's a 7-11 right across the street and a few good places to eat at a walking distance so that's a pro.  The room has AC, a microwave, small fridge, coffee maker and even an ironing board. Fully equipped.

This place is Fenomenal, the Rooms are spotless no stins, no unwanted odors. Definitly if you want to have an excelent days in San Clemente you must be here. Owners are so clean and care about Customers.

The room was very clean and everything was nice looking.  It looks like it has been recently updated.  The staff was friendly and helpful.  The beds were very comfortable.  I didnt hear anything from any of the other rooms.  It is on a main street, so there was a small amount of street noise.  The AC worked great and the quiet fan covered most of the street noise.  I got a great nights sleep.

I had the honor to stay at hotel Miramar this Memorial Day weekend. My boyfriend and I searched for hours for a place to stay (yes we looked last minute), I called the Hotel and the kind lady, Who I believe to be the owner stated that she'd hold the last room she had left for me. We were hesitant at first, wondering if we'd be sleeping on germs and what not, but we rushed over right away. This place is by far the most comfortable and accommodating place Ive had stayed at without looking at the reviews or photos. The beds were extremely comfortable. There was a microwave, TV with cable, Blow dryer and refrigerator. We had a great stay at Hotel Miramar and would recommend it to anyone who wants to enjoy a nice comfy sleep in San Clemente. Did I mention the Friendly and awesome

Summary Heading: The nice people at Hotel Miramar
Summary: The room was immaculate! Very cozy, a large King bed, sitting area, large dressing area with adjacent shower. wide screen TV. The owners were very nice and I would recommend this Hotel Miramar to everyone. I had to check in very late at night and they not only held the room for me, they stayed very late to greet me. The hotel is very close to a famous beach resort town of San Clemente with a whole strip of quaint shops and restaurants. You can jump right onto the main Highway I-5 that takes to you to all of the Southern California beach and harbor towns. It was a pleasure to stay there.
Manager Response: Every review like yours helps us get the word out that we represent great value and caring service. Thank you.

Summary: This is a really nice hotel.  The rooms are really nice with lots of light and comfortable bedding.  They also have flat screen televisions with DirecTV, and Keurig coffee makers.  This place is located right off the 5 Freeway and there are some places to eat close by.  Overall, this place was a pretty good place to stay.

We arrived  in San Clemente after a long flight and all we needed was a place to sleep.   The hotel is easy to find . Check in was a pleasure .    Rooms are clean and Spacious.  The beds were very comfortable and you could not ask for anything more .   There are a few restaurants down the street .      Breakfast is served in the morning.   ( I have to thank the owner for treating us to a very special breakfast !!!) Highly recommended
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your recent visit and subsequent wonderful praise. Feedback, especially from such well-spoken customers like you, is not only invaluable to those researching businesses like ours, but is also important to us. We greatly appreciate you taking the time to share your comments and feedback with us. Thanks again.

Summary: The room was clean and comfortable. Coffee maker, safe and TV were great. Heater/cooler was hard to reach but worked great. Location was close to the San Clemente Pier. Loved the King size bed. The restaurants were nice just down the street which we used. It is a very easy location to get to Camp Pendleton where we visited our son.

Stayed here for one night on a business trip - needed a quick place to lay my head for a night on a trip down from LA to San Diego.  The room was nice and large and clean, and a nice standard - much nicer inside than you would expect for a roadside Motel.  had a nice walk down to the beach, which is an easy drive or a 15 min walk away.  Highly recommended!

Summary Heading: If you want to spend $300 on a $100 room this is the place for you!
Summary: OK, let me say the good things first.  The rooms have been updated and are mostly clean, except for the hairs in the tub.  But, despite sprucing up this is still a MOTEL not a hotel.  Right across from an auto service strip warehouse, adjacent to a 7/11, I would have been happy to pay the $100 to stay for a night.  Unfortunately, the charge was THREE HUNDRED DOLLARS for one evening.  Oh, and the golf course picture?  That's not looking out the back window...it's a couple of miles away.  If you want to just stop and spend the night in a clean motel with loud room air conditioners, this may be the place for you as it's right off the freeway.  Just don't fork up such an outrageous sum of money for the honor.

I don't see how you can beat this value. Clean, full amenities in room (safe, refrigerator, coffee maker, premium channels on tv, ironing board). The room was squeaky clean with a generous amount of space. The price was excellent for this area. We definitely would stay here again.

If you're used to staying in upscale chain hotels, the location and appearance of the outside of the motel may make you hesitate on arrival. However, the rooms have been refurbished and are quite good.  The beds were as comfortable as any I've slept in, the water pressure in the shower was great, there was free wi-fi for multiple devices, and the cable selection on the TV was complete (though figuring out how to use the TV was complicated).  Also, the front desk manager was very helpful. Finally, if like us, you have to leave to be somewhere early in the AM, there is a 7-11 across the street which had a very thorough selection of breakfast items. The main downside to the hotel is that the road outside is quite noisy, so unless you're sleeping with the air conditioning on (which

This place is not love at first sight.  It's one of those hotels I think about from the 70's on long family vacations. It is well maintained and looks fine on the outside. Once you open the door your mind is put to ease.  The beds are great, the room is big, the a/c, mini frig, safe, microwave, internet and Keurig coffee machine were all in working condition.  Hot water is hot and the shower head doesn't drizzle it is a true shower head!  We all slept very well and would stay here again if in the area.

This place was way better than I expected and very fairly priced. The rooms where spotless. The beds were very comfortable. The shower had good water pressure. A perfect place for a surfing vacation. We also were able to bring our dog, which was a nice plus.  Being pet friendly made this motel stand out; usually the dog friendly places  are somewhat shabby, but this one wasn't , recently updated and sparkling clean. I highly recommend it. The only reason i didn't give it all 5 stars was not to confuse TA readers, this is a simple no frills motel, but awesome for its class.
Manager Response: vvv758,  Thanks for the very positive review. It was our pleasure to provide you with your lodging needs. It is such feedback that enables us to do our jobs better and provide better service when you visit us again.  Sincerely, Drew GM

Summary Heading: Top of my List for Guests/Visitors
Summary: I live in the area and had to stay at a local hotel for a few nights. Being summertime everything is booked or overpriced and I had to stay at a few different places. I kept seeing this hotel, but I wasn't sure. Finally, the last night I stayed. Wow, I wish I would have known - I would have stayed here the whole time. The staff is friendly and accommodating. This small hotel/motel is totally renovated. I felt like it was better than some of the 3-4 stars I stay at. CLEAN room, amazingly comfortable (soft but firm) beds, great pillows, new tv, softer towels than most places, showers drain properly, ample space for a studio style hotel room. As another reviewer here said - close to the "heart" of San Clemente, but far enough that it's a little quieter - true story. Also, you are
Manager Response: Lesly R,  WOW. Thanks a lot for the glowing review.   I am thrilled to hear that we made the top of your list for guests and visitors. It really means a lot to our staff when we receive such positive feedback from our guests. We are in the hospitality business and it's with great pride which we do our work. When our guests are happy, we are happy.   Again, thanks for staying with us.  Sincerely, Drew GM

Summary: Exceptional staff, comfortable and clean room - what a great place to stay. Quiet, small, excellent value. Owners on-site. It was a great romantic getaway. Nice sized fridge, microwave in room too. Close to the "heart" of San Clemente but far enough away that it is a little quieter streetwise. Easy access to freeway too. Lots of food choices nearby.
Manager Response: Sunflowermary,  It was a pleasure having you stay at our hotel, while on your trip from Albuquerque. We are happy to hear that you had a nice romantic getaway and that our staff was able to accommodate your needs. We hope you will visit us again soon.  Sincerely, Drew GM

Summary: They have done a very nice job on their re-model of this hotel. The room was fully appointed with free Wi-Fi and a very cool coffee maker. A problem that we had with the toilet was addressed and repaired within 10 minutes. The owner inspected our room for us upon arrival and saw us off when we left. We recommend The Miramar as an affordable, quality place to stay.
Manager Response: Craig t,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our small hotel in San Clemente. I am pleased to hear that you enjoyed the Keurig Coffee Maker and the free Wi-Fi we offer at the hotel. Regarding the toilet, I am sincerely sorry for the inconvenience it caused, and am happy to hear it was remedied for you.   Again, thanks for staying with us and I hope you will stay with us again.  Sincerely, Drew GM

Summary: If you're looking for a huge hotel reception with nice carperting and a buch of employees running around, Hotel Miramar is not the place for you. But you're going to San Clemente to enjoy the beach and want to stay in a hotel with a nice size and clean bedroom at a very good rate, this is definately the place!
Manager Response: RafaelSTL,  Thanks for taking the time to write a review of our hotel. It is such feedback that makes us our staff even more motivated to serve each and every guest.   We certainly hope you will consider us again for your future visit to San Clemente.  Sincerely, Drew GM

Summary Heading: Nice little hotel in heart of San Clemente.
Summary: Well the Hotel Miramar is a small hotel in the heart of San Clemente. It looks very simple from the outside. Pleasant surprise on the inside. The rooms are spacious and very clean. Room had a huge desk,fridge and a microwave. Great shower and air conditioner. Naren the owner is fantastic. Highly recommend this place.
Manager Response: Dear Fred,  It was our pleasure to have you stay at our hotel recently. I am glad you enjoyed all the amenities and features we offer in all our rooms. I hope you will consider staying at our hotel again in the near future. We have since upgraded all the coffee machines in our hotel to the very highly regarded Keurig coffee machines. We will also be adding a new shower experience and new desk chairs to make your stay even more memorable.  Sincerely, Naren Bhakta

Summary Heading: It was very clean spacious and well appointed
Summary: I would highly recommend it as a quick and easy stop very nice staff  it was exceptionally clean very roomy and comfortable. It had all the Amenities of a much more expensive accommodation it was very easy access on and off the freeway.  There were conveniently located stores and restaurants within walking distance. It is not a beach access hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Mjjhannon,  I want to thank you for staying with us at our hotel in San Clemente. I am pleased to hear that you had an enjoyable stay while you were in San Clemente. Your feedback is extremely valuable to the operations of our hotel and we very much value your feedback.  My staff and I hope that you will consider us again in the future on your visit to San Clemente.  Sincerely, Drew GM

Summary: The price is very fair for the bedroom that is presented. The king size bed is amazing such as the shower! The bedroom has a lot of room and has it all, microwave, refrigerator, free wifi, cable tv, air conditioner and has many shops around. There is a liquor store, a gas station, a laundry place 1 minute walking and it is located 3 minutes by car from downtown San Clemente Pier. The staff is amazing and very helpfull, They gave me important informations how to rent a surfboard there and made my day. I love that place and the staff were really kind, more than they had to. Thanks guys!
Manager Response: Dear Ll d,  Thanks for taking the time to leave a positive review of our hotel on TripAdvisor.   It was our pleasure to take care of all your needs while you were in San Clemente. We always strive to exceed the expectations of our gusts, and I am glad to hear we were able to do that for you.   We hope you will consider us again in the future when you come back to San Clemente.  Sincerely, Drew GM

Summary: Very convenient, safe location, comfy beds, friendly owners who reside on site, roomy updated and nicely decorated. I would definitely stay here again. AC  unit was rather noisy but luckily we didn't need to run it very much in May.
Manager Response: Dear Kathie,  Thank you for taking the time to leave such positive feedback on TripAdvisor for our hotel.   We are pleased to hear that you had an enjoyable stay and a good time in San Clemente.   We hope to see you again soon.  Sincerely, Drew GM

Summary Heading: Comfortable place to rest halfway between Los Angeles and San Diego
Summary: Recently spent one night at the Hotel Miramar in San Clemente, CA on the night prior to my flight home out of LAX airport.  Friendly, helpful desk clerk allowed me to borrow his luggage scale in order to re-arrange and weigh my family's 4 pieces of luggage.  Overall, nice place to stay with comfortable bed, flat-screen television, and large frig (for a hotel).  Room was pretty clean.  Only complaint would be the squeeky bathroom door in Room 304.
Manager Response: Wagz1601,  First and foremost, a big thank you goes to you for staying with us at our hotel. We were more than happy to provide you with the scale to weigh your luggage; we know how the airlines are :). We are thrilled to hear you had a nice stay with us, and even more so that you enjoyed the amenities we strive to offer.   Regarding the bathroom door, please accept our sincere apologies. Please note that we have since fixed the squeaky bathroom door in room 304. We hope you will consider us again for your future trips to California.  Sincerely, Drew General Manger

Summary Heading: Comfy and close to OC Tavern
Summary: Bed was comfy and room was pretty clean. The road noise calms down at night so we got a good nights sleep. The owner was nice and got our TV working quickly. You can go dancing across the street at the OC Tavern (no cover charge) and if you have too much to drink just walk back to the hotel, your car is safe behind the tavern!
Manager Response: Kori,  We are glad you had a comfortable stay at our hotel recently. We do apologize for the TV not working when you first got to your room but are pleased that the issue was resolved quickly. As you may have noticed we pride ourselves on our service and are very happy to hear that you had a nice stay in San Clemente.  Sincerely, Drew General Manager

Summary Heading: Great rooms for a great price!!
Summary: Me and my husband just stayed here for a week while we were looking for an apartment and the people were so helpful and they did Military Discount. The rooms were pretty nice and it came with a good size fridge, microwave, flat screen TV with Direct TV, a desk, and the beds were so comfortable!!! It was a very pleasant stay and I definitely recommend if you are on a budget!
Manager Response: Kasie_LR,  It was a pleasure having both you and your husband stay with us this past month. We love it when guests enjoy a comfortable stay and leave happy. As always, thanks to you and your family for being proud Service Members of our country.  Sincerely, General Manager

Summary: I booked this room for my sons and I because they had a baseball tournament in San Clemente. I had called directly and the owner was very friendly and accommodating. The room was located in a convenient and easily accessible area with a 24 hour convenience store across the street. The room was clean and had all of the necessary amenities. During the afternoon and evening the traffic was loud but it subsided when it was time to turn in and did not affect our night's sleep.  One observation - when I went to make coffee in the morning, it looked like the previous guest had made coffee and the pot hadn't been cleaned (I opted for the convenience store across the street). Overall, the room worked out well for the one night we spent there, and I would stay there again. Good value for
Manager Response: HawaiianSon90,  It was our pleasure to have you stay at our hotel. We always strive to give the best value to our guests. I sincerely apologize for the coffee machine being dirty during your use. We will be replacing the coffee machines with single cup machines to ensure that in the future such issues do not occur.  Sincerely, General Manager  PS. I hope your son's baseball team won the tournament.

Summary: We stayed 3 nights while visiting my grandson at Camp Pendleton.We were just driving by, looking for a place to stay for the night. We ended up staying all 3 nights we were in the area. Owners very nice and helpful. The hotel is very close to the marine base, and within walking distance to beautiful San Clemente beach. The rooms are spacious, with dish t.v. and  a ton of channels, microwave, fridge, in wall, safe,iron and ironing board,tub-shower combo, Paul Mitchell products, free wifi There's a 7-11 across the street, and many restaurants and fast food places nearby The bed was very comfortable, and the pillows were so awesome I took the pillowcases off to check the label( couldn't find one) The cost was only $82 per night including tax. We will definitely stay at the Miramar
Manager Response: nana123_13,  Thanks for your kind words. As the owners we take in pride in offering our guests the highest quality amenities and service possible all at a reasonable price. We also want to thank your grandson for serving our beautiful country and we were honored that you chose to stay with us.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Sincerely, General Manager - Hotel Miramar

Summary: Trip Advisor reviews helped us pick this for our 2 night stay. Friendly owners, clean and spacious room, great price and good location. The pictures are accurate representations. We would stay again if in the area. The bed was good but a bit too hard for me. Be sure to bring ear plugs as the traffic noise is quite loud.
Manager Response: L S,  Thank you for staying with us recently. We are thrilled that you chose our hotel from the many positive reviews on TripAdvisor, and more importantly even more thrilled that you had a pleasant stay. We certainly hope that on your next trip back, you will stay with us again.   Sincerely, General Manager - Hotel Miramar

Summary: The owner is very accommodating Rooms are clean The location is very convenient
Manager Response: On behalf of our hotel staff, I am writing to let you know how delighted we were to receive your kind words of praise.  Given the very nature of the hotel business, the hours are long and demanding.  Day or night, good service depends upon people willing to give their very best at all times.  That's why it's truly rewarding when a guest recognizes our staff’s efforts, and takes the time to say thank you.  We accommodate many guests each evening, and we strive to make their night's stay a satisfying one.  The principal goal of our hotel is to provide dependable service to all of our guests at reasonable prices.  But, it's only through their eyes that we can accurately assess the quality of the accommodations and services we provide.  Again, let me thank you for your kind words.  We're committed to total guest satisfaction, and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Good location (7/11 market, laudry, shops, bakery,... very close) , clean rooms, very good price and excellent courtesy. High reccomended!!!

Summary Heading: Very nice place to stay for the price
Summary: My husband and I took our young adult son with us to visit our marine at Camp Pendleton.  He had overnight liberty that night and had to stay with a buddy so we had 5 of us.  We got 2 rooms with 2 queen beds each at the Hotel Miramar for $160 including tax.  I believe that was $75 / room before tax.  That is a good price for 2 queen beds.  I was impressed at how clean and comfortable the room was.  I enjoyed the coffee, the internet, the fancy soap, shampoo, conditioner and lotion and the shower.  My only complaint was that the bed had only a sheet and a comforter.  I prefer a light blanket, but that is my own quirk.  If I could have turned off the heater, I would have been fine, but hubby was cold, so that's the way it goes.  By the way, I really liked the heater, it managed to
Manager Response: Dear HermanaLinda,  Thanks for taking the time to write a review about our hotel. As the owner it means a great deal to us to know that our guests are satisfied when they stay with us.   Thanks for bringing to our attention the need for a soft blanket in our rooms, as this is something we will be adding later this year as we renovate our rooms once again.  We hope you come stay with us again and we enjoyed having you.  Sincerely, Management

Summary Heading: Clean rooms, poor service, not friendly owners
Summary: we stayed 8 nights at this hotel, rooms are clean the hotel seemed renovated, bed are not as good as advertised but OK.overall rates/quality was better then their competitors, we asked to have the room cleaned and maintained everyday but they merely fix the sheet and not even changed them,on our 5 day of stay we smelled a bad odor and never could figure out why? not from us or our kids, not from the bathroom either, but an awful smell like a rotten dead animal,  owners seem a bit possessive about their owned hotel which makes a paying guest not at home, parking is a problem if you need to park in the property parameter, we parked on the street and didn't have any break ins, we mostly ate in Dana Point, breakfast are a must at Stakes pancake house ( a sure thing), overall we
Manager Response: Dear Koz,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about our hotel. Every review regardless of whether it is good or bad helps us determine the strengths and weaknesses of our hotel.  It is our policy to have the rooms cleaned daily and have the sheets replaced every other day or when the guest requests it. I will check with our Housekeeping staff to ensure that they follow the proper protocol as to ensure your complete satisfaction. Please accept my apology regarding this matter.  We also take great pride in ownership and guest satisfaction of our hotel as we have been the owners for over 26 years. I certainly hope this one mediocre experience will not deter you from coming back.  Sincerely, Management

Summary Heading: One of the BEST Hotels in Southern California!
Summary: The room was extremely spacious, the bed was AMAZINGLY comfortable, the price was incredible for the location, the water pressure was great and the customer service was impeccible! I had a wonderful visit and the accomodations superceded my expectations; thank you Hotel Miramar!!!  Matthew Theodore

My boyfriend and I wanted to get away for a romantic weekend. Friends recommended hotel Miramar and we were not disappointed. The room was very spacious and clean. Huge comfortable bed, large screen TV up high on the wall, which made watching movies in bed very comfortable.The fridge and microwave were very useful. Located close to shops and restaurants and walking distance to the gorgeous beaches. A short drive to both Dana Point and Laguna Beach. The staff were very friendly and helpful. My boyfriend and I highly recommend staying here. It is the best budget hotel to stay at and close to everything. We will definitely be planning another stay at Hotel Miramar, although next time we will stay longer than just the weekend!

I was traveling to San Diego from Santa Cruz when the traffice and long drive got the best of me. I took the South El Camino Real exit off the 5, turned left,  and looked for the first well-kept hotel. It only took me to a couple of blocks to find this gem.   The room was spacious, clean, and well-furnished. The wi-fi was fast, the flat screen had Direct-TV, and the bed was as comfortable as my own.  The staff  was extraordinarily helpful and friendly and the location allowed me to walk to one of several nearby restaurants for breakfast.

A friend and I had the pleasure of staying at the Hotel Miramar in San Clemente for a weekend trip to California to visit a friend.  We couldn't have been more pleased with our stay there!  The hotel itself sits on the main road as you drive through the city of San Clemente so there are several stores, shops, restaurants, etc. within walking distance.  The gorgeous beaches of Dana Point and several other Pacific Ocean beaches are also just minutes away.  This was definitely an added bonus.  The best part of the hotel, by far, however is the rooms.  We were quite surprised at how spacious and clean the rooms were.  The internet connection was amazing - we had full speed service throughout our stay.  There is a large flat screen television in the rooms with a variety of Direct TV

Summary Heading: Best Value for money!Modern,very clean rooms with heaven like beds..
Summary: We stayed here two times already & would return again. The rooms are spacious, very clean & the service is friendly. The beds are huge & the most comfortable we ever slept in away from home. The duvets are modernstyle, towels thick & clean. There's a very good wifi connection, flat screen tv, big working table, litlle couch to sit on, comfotable leather working chair, coffeemaker, microvave, fridge..all you need! Including very good maid service, the rooms look like new everytime they went inside. The only bad thing is that the windows go out to the street so it might be a bit noisy.  All togehter we would say this is the best place tro stay on a budget in San Clemente, feels more than in a lot more expensive Hotel with a big name.  Highly recommended!

From the beautiful dahlias outside our window to the lovely proprietor, this place was a real find. The price was the same as elsewhere, yet the quality was much better. Traffic noise is minimal once the door is shut. Easy and comfortable desk chair, good set up for working. Easy parking. Easy freeway access.

and a small bathroom with a separate area for the sink and mirror. This hotel is not close to the quaint shopping areas and nice places to eat, it took us about 30 minutes to walk there.  The lady at the front office was pregnant and of Indian origin (India),  We noticed that she had been sitting in a back room that looked like a home living room watching TV and regardless of our nice deameanor she was not very friendly with a uncaring.  After checking into our room we asked for taxi information and it seemed too be too much trouble for her.  Overall we found this place to be a good price and it was clean., just make sure you have transportation to get around town.

Summary Heading: Great value. Attentive service. Very comfortable.
Summary: I have stayed regularly at this small family run hotel on business for a number of months. It is always very clean and very comfortable. Rooms were all recently updated. Large flat screen TV. Free fast internet. The proprietors go out of their way to make sure you have a comfortable stay. A great value option.

I have been staying weekly in San Clemente for business over the past three years.  I used to stay in some of the larger "name brand" hotels, but recently because their value/price just wasn't cutting it I tried San Clemente Motor Lodge - and I'm hooked!  Great value/price (usually least expensive in the area) with great, clean, newly remodeled rooms.  Beds are extremely comfortable, with sophisticated amenities - something I would normally see at a Hilton or Hyatt (at 3X the price).  What's also great is that it's walking distance to Dry Cleaners, a sundry shop (7-11), and a number of good local restaurants - not like most of the places I used to stay.  Stay here, you'll be surprised with what great value you get for such an inexpensive price - and you'll keep coming back as I

Summary Heading: An affordable bouitque hotel that delivers excellent value
Summary: Extremely clean, spacious, and well-appointed room with the same amenties of more expensive accomodations. They.even have a  complimentary breakfast. bar with fresh fruit, juice, etc. I have found the staff both professional and friendly, displaying the warmth and concern for their guests that only a family run-enterprise.could provide.
